titles.title: 372 Sunshine In My Soul (nice easy tune)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is sunshine
In my soul today
More glorious and bright
Than glows in
Any earthly sky
For Jesus is my light

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
O there's sunshine
Blessed sunshine
While the peaceful
Happy moments roll
When Jesus shows
His smiling face
There is sunshine
In my soul

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There is music
In my soul today
A carol to my King
And Jesus
Listening can hear
The song I cannot sing

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There is sprintime
In my soul today
For when the Lord is near
The dove of peace
Sings in my heart
The flow'rs
Of grace appear

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
There is gladness
In my soul today
And hope and praise
And love
For blessings
Which he gives me now
For joys laid up above
